dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: What do you want, human filth?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Don't be rude, I seek peaceful conversation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful conversation? Ha! You're delusional.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I warn you, show respect or face the consequences!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Consequences? You can't scare us. We're the powerful ones here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a chance to leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave? We stay where we want, and we want to crush you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You leave me no choice but to fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! A fight it is, let's see how feeble you really are.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall leave you to your ignorance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good riddance, weakling. Run along now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps we'll meet again under better circumstances.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Doubt it. We have no interest in the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This isn't over; remember my name, Frenzied Vermin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Remember? No need. You're forgettable and insignificant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't have time for this. Tell me what you want or stay silent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impatient, are we? You humans are all the same.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Speak your purpose or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Consequences you say? How amusing. We'll make you regret that.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to face me right here and now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge accepted! Prepare to meet your end, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not engage in pointless banter. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell? Not quite. We'll make sure you regret crossing us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see talking to you is pointless. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, weakling. Remember our strength.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Strength without wisdom is a hollow victory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Hah! We need no wisdom to crush pests like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Pests like you are not worth my time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Not worth your time? How arrogant. We'll make you pay for that.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful parting? As if we'd grant you such a luxury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We have no reason to fight. Let's go our separate ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No reason? How about the reason of our disdain for your kind!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be dragged into a senseless fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Senseless? It makes perfect sense to us. Prepare for pain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will offer you one last chance to walk away.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A chance? You disgust us. We'll take pleasure in your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your hostility will only bring you ruin. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ruins, you say? We'll show you ruins beyond your imagination.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I leave you to your own misery. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Misery? A laughable notion from the likes of you. Now face our wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your wrath is nothing compared to my resolve. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve? Ha! Let's see how resolved you are when facing our fury.
